metadata.title: CVE-2022-48693 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: soc:brcmstb: pm-arm: Fix refcount leak and __iomem leak bugs Inbrcmstb_pm_probe(), there are two kinds of leak bugs: (1) we need to addof_node_put() when for_each__matching_node() breaks (2) we need to addiounmap() for each iomap in fail path

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
